title: 2021 Divisional Round Weekend Recap
itunes:title: 2021 Divisional Round Weekend Recap
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal recap all of the games from the Divisional Round starting with one of the best games in ATN history, an overtime thriller between the Bills and Chiefs. The heroes then recap the three contests that ended with game-winning field goals, first Titans-Bengals, followed by Buccaneers-Rams, and finally finishing with Packers-Niners.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
